name: Gortek and the Microchips
overview: This delightful and unique concept in teach young people to program couples a spaces adventure story with lessons in BASIC programming. The planet of Syntax is being invaded by fearsome Zitrons! Gortek is working furiously to teach the Microschips to program the great computer to ward off the attack. The full-color storybook of this adventure incorporates the Microchips Training manual that will teach your child the fundamentals of programming in BASIC. They too, can learn to stop the Zitrons.
